channel.title: Lorenzo's Daily Deep Dive
channel.description: A daily analysis of all of the AI and global news of the day I find from subscribing to a bunch of interesting newsletters
channel.itunes:author: Lorenzo Thione
channel.itunes:summary: A daily analysis of all of the AI and global news of the day I find from subscribing to a bunch of interesting newsletters

item.title: Welcome to Lorenzo's Daily Deep Dive
item.description: Lorenzo's Daily Deep Dive is a daily AI-generated podcast covering the latest in AI, tech, and business news curated from top newsletters. New episodes every morning.
item.itunes:title: Welcome to Lorenzo's Daily Deep Dive
item.itunes:summary: Lorenzo's Daily Deep Dive is a daily AI-generated podcast covering the latest in AI, tech, and business news curated from top newsletters. New episodes every morning.
